senselogic.sitevision.api.search

Interface SearchFactory


  • @Requireable(value="SearchFactory")
public interface SearchFactory
    Factory for creating search-related instances.

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via Utils.getSearchFactory(). See Utils for how to obtain an instance of the Utils interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 3.6
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren

      • getSearchSortField

        SearchSortField getSearchSortField(String aField,
                                   boolean aIsAscending)
                            throws IllegalArgumentException
        Convenience method to get a SearchSortField instance.
        Parameters:
        aField - name of the sortable index field
        aIsAscending - the sort order (true == ascending, false == descending)
        Returns:
        a SearchSortField instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if aField is null or whitespace-only

      • getSearchUtil

        SearchUtil getSearchUtil()
        Convenience method to get a SearchUtil instance. A SearchUtil instance can also be retrieved via the Utils.getSearchUtil()
        Returns:
        a SearchUtil instance

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
